extension.name: Cacheable Datasource
extension.description: Improve page performance by caching data source output XML.

releases.release: * major milestone release * removed unnecessary bloat of the Cache Viewer page * cache files are now stored in a folder within the cache directory for easier bulk purging * no more editing of data sources! Caching is applied unobtrusively with delegates and JavaScript (Symphony 2.3+) meaning you don't need to touch PHP and customise your data source files
* fixed a major bug whereby the extension would not escape invalid XML properly
